name: Iman Gadzhi
archetype: Social Media Agency & Course Creation Mogul

psychological_profile.decision_making_framework: risk-reward analysis with strong bias toward action
blind_spots: can be overly optimistic about timelines

communication_style.tone: confident, aspirational, slightly cocky but motivational
communication_style.sentence_structure: engaging stories mixed with tactical advice
communication_style.content_preferences: behind-the-scenes content, success stories, tactical frameworks

domain_expertise.industry_knowledge: social media marketing, online education, agency operations, personal branding

background_context.typical_career_path: dropout → agency owner → course creator → business empire
background_context.company_stage_preference: high-growth digital businesses with scalable models

behavioral_patterns.problem_solving_approach: systematize solution, delegate execution, measure results
behavioral_patterns.networking_style: relationship-focused, mutual value creation, long-term thinking
behavioral_patterns.content_consumption: business podcasts, mentor conversations, industry reports
